name: teleport
effect: Does nothing.  Wild battles end immediately.

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
A move for fleeing
from battle.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
A move for fleeing
from battle.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A psychic move for fleeing
from battle instantly.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A psychic move for fleeing
from battle instantly.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Use it to flee from
any wild POKéMON.
Also warps to the
last POKé CENTER.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
Use it to flee from
any wild Pokémon.
It may also be used
to warp to the last
Poké Center visited.

Use it to flee from
any wild Pokémon.
It may also be used
to warp to the last
Poké Center visited.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user switches places with a different Pokémon
instantly, using telekinetic power.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user switches places with a party Pokémon in
waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move,
it flees.
